pages.text: A shield powered by $(will)Demon Will$(), offering both superior defense and offensive capabilities. This shield has $(bold)4x the durability$() of a normal shield (1344 vs 336) and grants $(bold)special effects when blocking$() based on the type of demon will available in the area.

Created by combining a $(item)Shield$() with two $(item)Soul Snares$() (demon will containers from Blood Magic). The Sentient Shield inherits the protective capabilities of a normal shield while gaining the power to harness demon will for both defense and offense.

pages.title: Blocking Effects
pages.text: When you successfully block an attack with the Sentient Shield and have at least $(bold)10 demon will$() nearby, powerful effects activate based on will type:$(br2)$(will)Raw/Default Will:$()$(br)Grants you $(bold)Strength II$() for 5 seconds$(br2)$(will)Steadfast Will:$()$(br)Grants you $(bold)Resistance II$() for 5 seconds$(br2)$(italic)Defensive effects empower the wielder.$()

pages.title: Offensive Effects
pages.text: $(will)Corrosive Will:$()$(br)Afflicts the attacker with $(bold)Poison II$() for 5 seconds$(br2)$(will)Vengeful Will:$()$(br)Reflects $(bold)30% of damage$() back to the attacker and applies $(bold)Weakness$() for 5 seconds$(br2)$(italic)Turn defense into offense!$()

pages.title: Will Source
pages.text: The Sentient Shield draws power from $(bold)demon will stored in Soul Gems$() in your inventory, not from will in the area. Simply carry a filled $(item)Tartaric Gem$() or $(item)Petty/Lesser/Greater Tartaric Gem$() and the shield will use that will to determine which blocking effect to apply.$(br2)The shield automatically adapts to the $(bold)demon will type with the highest amount$() in your gems.

pages.title: Will Enhancement
pages.text: While the Sentient Shield is equipped (main hand or offhand), you gain a $(bold)30% bonus$() to all demon will gained. This powerful passive effect makes the shield invaluable for will-focused builds.$(br2)$(italic)Note: The will gain bonus is currently not implemented due to technical limitations with Blood Magic's API. The blocking effects work as intended and consume a small amount of will from your gems when triggered!$()

pages.title: Combat Strategy
pages.text: The Sentient Shield excels in multiple scenarios:$(br2)$(bold)Tank Build:$()$(br)Use Steadfast will for Resistance II and become nearly unkillable$(br2)$(bold)Counter Build:$()$(br)Use Vengeful will to reflect damage and punish attackers$(br2)$(bold)Aggressive Build:$()$(br)Use Raw will for Strength II and destroy enemies after blocking$(br2)$(italic)Adapt to any combat situation with the right demon will type.$()
